Warjacks do not have to spend focus to run during this movement. During this movement models cannot be targeted by free strikes.
warcaster.spell: A warjack damaged by this attack becomes stationary for one round.
Target friendly model/unit gains +3 DEF against ranged and magic attack rolls.
Target friendly warjack can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus and gains boosted melee attack rolls.
The force of this attacks blasts apart the earth itself.

warcaster.capacity: This model will work for Cryx, Khador and the Protectorate.
This model gains an additional die on its back strike damage rolls.
This model cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks while knocked down.
This model can upkeep spells on models in its battlegroup without spending focus.

warcaster.name: Magnus2

melee_weapon.name: Foecleaver
melee_weapon.capacity: When calculating damage from this attack, halve the base ARM stats of models hit that have medium or larger bases. This attack gains +2 to damage rolls against models with small bases.

melee_weapon.name: Mechanikal Arm
melee_weapon.capacity: When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it is knocked down.

warcaster.feat: Choose two table edges. Enemy models beginning an advance in Magnus' control area cannot advance toward those table edges for one round.
warcaster.spell: Target friendly model gains +2 DEF against ranged attack rolls and Dodge, (A model with Dodge can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.)
Friendly models gain +2 to attack and damage rolls against target enemy model/ unit.
When Convection destroys a living enemy model, allocate 1 focus point to a warjack in this model's battlegroup that is in its control area.
Models in this model's battlegroup currently in its control area gain +2 SPD and Pathfinder for one turn.
The force of this attacks blasts apart the earth itself.
warcaster.capacity: This model will work for Cryx, Khador and the Protectorate.
This model gains an additional die on its back strike damage rolls.

If you can have two or more warlocks in your army, this model and warjacks in its battlegroup can take the place of a Skorne warlock. This model counts toward the maximum number of warlocks allowed in an army and counts as a warlock for FA.
One non-character warjack in Magnus's battlegroup can begin the game bonded to him. The warjack gains Backstab.

warcaster.name: Gorten Grundback

ranged_weapon.name: Dual Hand Cannon
ranged_weapon.capacity: This model gains +4 to the damage roll for this attack. This model cannot make additional ranged attacks with this weapon during an activation it makes a Both Barrel attack.

melee_weapon.name: Forge Father
melee_weapon.capacity: On a critical hit, this model can slam the model hit instead of rolling damage normally. The model hit is slammed d6" directly away from this model and suffers a damage roll with POW equal to this model's STR plus the POW of this weapon. The POW of collateral damage is equal to this model's STR.

warcaster.feat: Choose a table edge and a distance up to 8". Enemy models currently in Gorten's control area are pushed the chosen distance directly toward the chosen table edge in the order you choose. For one round affected models cannot give or receive orders and suffer -3 SPD, RAT and DEF.
warcaster.spell: Models hit suffer a POW 14 fire damage roll. The AOE is a cloud effect that remains in play for one round. Models entering or ending their activation in the AOE suffer an unboostable POW 14 fire damage roll.
Target warjack suffer 1 point of fire damage to each column on its damage grid.
Place a wall template anywhere completely in this model's control area where it does not touch a model's base, an obstruction, or an obstacle. The wall is a linear obstacle that provides cover.
While in this model's control area, friendly models cannot be knocked down and do not suffer blast damage.
Target model in this model's battlegroup gains +4 STR.
warcaster.capacity: This model will work for Cygnar and Khador.
This model can have only Mercenary Rhulic warajacks in its battlegroup and can reactivate only friendly Mercenary Rhulic warjacks.

warcaster.name: Madhammer

melee_weapon.name: Leveler
melee_weapon.capacity: When this model hits with an attack with this weapon, it can spend 1 focus point to use Back Blast. If it does, center a 3" AOE on the model hit. Models in the AOE suffer a POW 10 blast damage roll. This damage is not considered to have been caused by a melee attack.

ranged_weapon.name: Buster
ranged_weapon.capacity: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.
After determining the point of impact, roll deviation for two additional 4" AOEs from that point. A model hit by one of the additional AOEs suffer a POW 7 blast damage roll.

This weapon's base stats become AOE - and POW 7 for this attack. When calculating damage from this attack, halve the base ARM stats of models with medium or larger bases. For this attack, this model gains +2 to damage rolls against models with small bases.

warcaster.feat: When in Madhammer's control area, friendly Faction models gain an additional die on blast damage rolls and AOE ranged attacks this turn.
warcaster.spell: When target friendly model makes a normal attack with a ranged weapon, the weapon gains Magical Weapon. If the weapon was AOE - it becomes AOE 3. An affected model cannot participate in a combined ranged attack. Models in the AOE other than the model that was directly hit suffer blast damage rolls but do not suffer any other effects of the attack. Explosivo expires immediately after resolving the target model's next ranged attack. Explosivo lasts for one turn.

Center a 5" AOE on this model. Each other model in the AOE is hit and suffers a POW 13 damage roll. Each model damaged by Ground Zero is pushed d6" directly away from this model in the order you choose.
While in this model's control area, enemy models treat open terrain as rough terrain. Inhospitable Ground lasts for one round.
On a critical hit, models hit lose their initial attacks and cannot make special attacks for one round.

Target friendly warrior model/unit gains +2 to melee attack and melee damage rolls but suffer -2 ARM. If an affected model is disabled by an enemy attack, center a 3" AOE on it and remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 14 blast damage roll.

Target warjack in this model's battlegroup gains +2 STR and SPD and can run, charge, or make power attack slams or tramples without spending focus. When it ends its activation, it suffers d3 damage points.

warcaster.name: Ashlynn

Once during your opponent's turn, when an enemy model within 12" of this model this is in its LOS targets this model with a ranged attack, this model can make a ranged attack against the enemy model before it makes it's attack roll. If this model's ranged attack hits, the enemy model suffer no damage but its attack automatically misses.
When this model is missed by an enemy melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one normal melee attack against the attacking model.

Target friendly model/unit ignores intervening models when making attacks. The weapons of affected models gain Magical Weapon.

When an enemy attack disables a friendly model in the target friendly unit, you can choose a non-disabled living model in the unit to be destroyed. If another model is destroyed as a result of Roth's Mercy, the originally disabled model heals 1 damage point.
When a living non-soulless model is boxed by Soulfire, this model gains 1 FURY point and the boxed model is removed from play.
This model can channel spells trough targed friendly model as if it were a model in this model's battlegroup with Arc Node.
warcaster.capacity: This model will work for Cryx, Cygnar and Khador.

Choose one friendly Sea Dog unit at the beginning of the game to be Cultists. Cultists are Thamarite models and gain Fearless. During your Control Phase, after replenishing focus, this model gains 1 additional focus point if it is within 1" of one or more Cultists.

When an enemy model misses this model with a magic attack, the attacking model becomes the target and is automatically hit by the attack. AOE magic attacks that miss are centered on the attacking model. This model is the point of origin for all these attacks.

warcaster.name: Montador

When this model destroys one or more enemy warrior models with a normal melee attack, after the attack is resolved this model can immediately advance up to 1".

Models in this model's battlegroup currently in its control area can immediately make one normal ranged attack. Attacks gained from Broadside do not count against a weapon's ROF. Broadside can be cast only once per turn.

When Deadweight destroys an enemy living or undead model, you can choose an enemy model within 2" of the destroyed model. The chosen model must forfeit either its movement or its action during its next activation, as its controller chooses.
